thread.title: Corey Allen: making a difference with more personal urban policing
thread.title_full: Corey Allen: making a difference with more personal urban policing

title: Corey Allen: making a difference with more personal urban policing
text:
Corey Allen: making a difference with more personal urban policing Share MP3 available 23.23 MB 
Senior Sergeant Corey Allen is Inspector at the Queensland Police Academy. 
When Richard spoke to him in 2015 he was Officer in Charge at Queensland's busiest police station, Brisbane Central. 
When Corey was young, police were a regular sight at his home and he was often the one who had to dial triple zero when the violence erupted. 
During his years with the Queensland Police Service, Corey developed several grassroots programs to tackle homelessness and other endemic social issues. 
By focusing on crime prevention his programs dramatically altered the way police and services work together to help people at risk. 
Further information
